laboratory_examinations.findings: Confirmed diagnosis of Borrelia burgdorferi infection.

Demonstrates high-grade atrioventricular block, a sinus rate at approximately 85 beats/min, and some P waves hidden within QRS complexes. Shows abnormal early repolarization with 3-mm coved ST-segment elevation and a biphasic T wave in leads V1 and V2, consistent with type 1 Brugada's pattern.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Type 1 Brugadaâ€™s pattern resolved with continued antibiotic treatment; a first-degree atrioventricular block remained.
